text: Federico García Vigil (5 January 1941 - 27 May 2020) was a Uruguayan composer and conductor. He was the conductor of the Montevideo Philharmonic Orchestra from 1994 to 2008. He was born in Montevideo. García Vigil died on 27 May 2020 in Montevideo, aged 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Conductors Category:Uruguayan composers Category:Musicians from Montevideo Category:20th-century composers
title: Federico García Vigil
